tests.prompt: Verify @kirkdiggler/rpg-api-protos is v0.1.55 or later with SourceRef, ConditionId, FeatureId types available
WEAPON_DISPLAY, ABILITY_DISPLAY, CONDITION_DISPLAY, FEATURE_DISPLAY maps exist and cover all enum values
WeaponDisplay component renders weapon name for any Weapon enum value
AbilityDisplay component renders 'STR', 'DEX', etc. for Ability enum values
ConditionDisplay component renders 'Rage', 'Sneak Attack', etc. for ConditionId enum values
FeatureDisplay component renders 'Breath Weapon', 'Radiance of Dawn', etc. for FeatureId enum values
SpellDisplay component renders spell name for Spell enum values
DamageSourceBadge correctly dispatches to WeaponDisplay/AbilityDisplay/etc based on SourceRef oneof case
DamageBreakdown component renders list of damage components with source badges and totals
npm run ci-check passes (format, lint, typecheck, build)
